title: Peashooter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- You may produce a sun. Costs 0 sun.
- You may deal a basic attack to a player. Costs 1 sun.
- You may deal a powerful attack to a player. Costs 2 sun.
- You may upgrade to a Repeater, giving you 1 free basic. You may still use your normal sun-costing attacks. Costs 3 sun.
- You may upgrade to a Gatling Pea, giving you 2 free powerful attacks. You may still use your normal sun-costing attacks. Costs 4 sun.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can upgrade to both a Repeater and a Gatling Pea.

desc:
Post 427
"How does success taste you ask me?" Peashooter slowly sips his hot tea, "I can't tell you about it now, I'm sorting my business contracts. Here's my coat, hold it well!"
